org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.extension

Class PropertiesExtensionConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.extension.AbstractExtensionConfigurationLoader
      • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.extension.PropertiesExtensionConfigurationLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CamelContextAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, ApplicationContextAware

    @Service
 @DependsOn(value="camelContext")
public class PropertiesExtensionConfigurationLoader
extends AbstractExtensionConfigurationLoader
    OpenHub extensions loader where extensions are defined in properties. Relevant properties are with '"context.ext"' prefix.
    Author:
    Petr Juza

      Constructor and Description
      PropertiesExtensionConfigurationLoader()
      Creates new extension loader with properties from environment.
